sentences.sContent: They  bowed before the emperor as he entered the court.
sentences.sContent_eng: They bowed before the emperor as he entered the court.
sentences.sCn: 皇帝进入朝廷时他们都向他鞠躬致敬。

sentences.sContent: The daughter of an emperor does not worry about finding a husband.
sentences.sContent_eng: The daughter of an emperor does not worry about finding a husband.

sentences.sContent: The old chancellor who had offended against the emperor was relegated to the distant boundaries of the country.
sentences.sContent_eng: The old chancellor who had offended against the emperor was relegated to the distant boundaries of the country.
sentences.sCn: 触犯了皇帝的老宰相被流放到遥远的边疆。

trans.tranOther: the man who is the ruler of an empire
